data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: Celia walks into the room and puts her bags down on the floor. She i_ going t_ be a_ the ho___ for th___ days. The ro__ is sm___ but ni__. She i_ tired bec____ she dr___ all d__ to g__ here. She goes to bed and sleeps well.
data.fullContent: Celia walks into the room and puts her bags down on the floor. She is going to be at the hotel for three days. The room is small but nice. She is tired because she drove all day to get here. She goes to bed and sleeps well.
data.answer: 西莉亚走进房间，把包放在地板上。她将在旅馆住三天。房间虽小但很漂亮。她开了一整天的车才到这里，所以很累。她上床睡得很好。
